Description: Mould-made pottery Frog-Type lamp decorated on top with palm-branches with curled stems. At the rear is a large boss; there are two smaller bosses on each side. The nozzle is largely lost; its top is decorated with ladder-pattern. Within the undefined base is an impressed alpha. Covered with a bright turquoise vitreous glaze, except for a reserved patch underneath.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2189.bis)
